subject: Rugby (Game)
Dancing
lead_paragraph: In an age when religious and tribal sensitivities are on the rise, can rugby afford to let the highest-ranked squad in the world make a throat-slitting gesture in public during their pregame haka dance?
snippet: In an age when religious and tribal sensitivities are on the rise, can rugby afford to let the highest-ranked squad in the world make a throat-slitting gesture in public during their pregame haka dance?
